title: How long can I sit in front of a computer every day without it affecting my health? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take a 15-20 minutes break every 1-2 hours to move about/climb up-down stairs/do on the spot jogging/skipping/aerobics.Do exercises for eyes (rolling eyeballs clockwise/anticlockwise; focussing alternately on a spot at a distance of 1 foot and 10 feet from your face)Drink lots of water.Eat healthy.Use a comfortable chair.Use an anti-glare screen.Make sure your wrists - forearms are at a comfortable angle while using the keyboard.Listen to background music.
